item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:382644”][quote author=xparty-hatszx link=topic=478437.msg3501890#msg3501890 date=1297807752]
http://pastebin.com/EwisFd7b

there is my player.java

heres compiler error

Player.java:853: illegal start of type public int maxItemAmmount = /* 2147000000*/2147000000; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]’

Why what you comment out something, then retype the exact same code? 

public int maxItemAmmount = 2147000000;

the error was because
it was counting
public int maxItemAmmount = /214700000/
as a green
then saying
214700000; by its self.
and that by its self is not a statement.

When i say green i just mean // infront of it.

Read full topic
